img.alt: Grand River Prep logo and home page link

div.main:
School Meals During Closure
Posted on March 16, 2020March 26, 2020 by Jenny Davis
March 26, 2020
Dear Titan families,
We have reconfigured our food distribution plan to provide as much access to families while reducing the number of workers needed to accommodate the “stay home, stay safe” mandate; therefore, we are consolidating our service with our NHA K-8 partner schools effective Monday, March 30.
Please find the food distribution locations, dates, and times:
Excel Charter Academy (4201 Breton SE, Kentwood), Tuesdays and Thursdays from 10:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. (Breakfast and Lunch)
Vanguard Charter Academy (1620 52nd Street SE, Wyoming), Mondays and Thursdays from 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. (Lunch only)
Vista Charter Academy (711 32nd Street SE, Grand Rapids), Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. (Breakfast and Lunch)
Cross Creek Charter Academy (7701 Kalamazoo Ave SE, Byron Center), Monday through Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. (Lunch only)
Three days worth of meals per visit, a breakfast (if applicable) and lunch meal per student per day, will be provided.
A complete list of other food sites is available www.michigan.gov/meetupeatup
Again, thank you for your support and patience as we continue to work to share timely, accurate updates with you.
PrepNet School Meals
Bookmark the permalink.
``
